name: Gas Tank
description:
Use the last Fuel Can available to fill the tank of your Hover Car and Smash every Zombie in your way.

You are short of Fuel but you'll make it count.

Controls:

Kill as many Zombies as you can before you run out of Fuel.
W, A, D/Up, Left, Right = Throttle/Steer
C =  Toggle Configuration
R = Restart Level
B = Previous Level
N = Next Level
E = Suicide
I = Toggle info
Esc = Exit

Credits:

Solo Developer:
Bionic Ape

Assets Used:

Reused Some Procedural Generation from my Previous Project Lazy Driver

Polygon City Zombies by Synty

Polygon City by Synty
